CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local currentPath = self.Entity.Path
local nameText = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath(currentPath .. "/info_top/text_name") -- 플레이어 이름 구성 nameText.TextComponent.Text = _UserService.LocalPlayer.PlayerComponent.Nickname
self.hpText = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath(currentPath .. "/info_bottom/Hp/text_value").TextComponent -- 체력바 구성 self.hpBar = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath(currentPath .. "/info_bottom/Hp/img_bar").UITransformComponent self.maxWidth_HP = self.hpBar.RectSize.x
self.ExpText = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath(currentPath .. "/info_bottom/Exp/text_value").TextComponent -- 경험치바 구성 self.ExpBar = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath(currentPath .. "/info_bottom/Exp/img_bar").UITransformComponent self.maxWidth_Exp = self.ExpBar.RectSize.x

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if self.hpBar ~= nil then -- 체력 깎이고 회복하는 UI local hp = _UserService.LocalPlayer.Common.HP local maxhp = _UserService.LocalPlayer.Common.MaxHP self.hpBar.RectSize = Vector2(hp / maxhp * self.maxWidth_HP,self.hpBar.RectSize.y) self.hpText.Text = string.format("%d / %d", hp,maxhp) end
if self.ExpBar ~= nil then -- 경험치 올라가는 UI local Exp = _UserService.LocalPlayer.StatComponent.EXP local maxExp = _UserService.LocalPlayer.StatComponent.EXP_table[math.floor(_UserService.LocalPlayer.StatComponent.Level)] self.ExpBar.RectSize = Vector2(Exp / maxExp * self.maxWidth_Exp, self.ExpBar.RectSize.y) self.ExpText.Text = string.format("%d / %d", Exp,maxExp) end
local Level_Value = _UserService.LocalPlayer.StatComponent.Level -- 레벨 표시 self.LevelUI.TextComponent.Text = string.format("LV %d",Level_Value)
